activities: NC4 Inc. provides situational awareness services to its Clients via a subscription services model.  In order to provide its services, NC4 requires certain its Clients or their third party agent(s) to provide NC4 with certain personal information of certain Client users and employees.  In performing its services, NC4 acts as a data processor in accordance with its Client's instructions and the agreement between NC4 and its Client.
contactoff1: NC4 Inc., 100 N. Sepulveda Blvd., Suite 200, El Segundo, CA  90245
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: NC4's Clients provide certain data regarding their organization, users, and certain employees.   During the initial provisioning process, as well as support, data may be manually processed.
